text: haja ke maheene prasidhd hain, jo vyakti inamen haja ka nishchay kar le, to (haja ke beech) kaam vaasana tatha avagya aur jhagade kee baaten na kare tatha tum jo bhee achchhe karm karoge, usaka gyaan allaah ko ho jaayega aur apane lie paathey bana lo, uttam paathey allaah kee aagyaakaarita hai tatha he samajh vaalo! mujhee se daro
